description: Audrey Noir is finally exacting her revenge on the priest who assaulted her when she was a senior in Catholic school. She amuses herself by applying paddles, crops, hairbrush and other impact toys on Father Jim's increasingly red naked ass, and gleefully humiliates him. But she has one more surprise for him: she's brought a specially equipped Bad Dragon strap-on and makes him get down on his knees to suck it until she "cums" all over him. Father Jim is left a sad, degraded mess, while Audrey can finally put her traumatic experience behind her.
title: Revenge On the Priest 3
